name: Arithmancy
text: You are able to unravel the hidden meanings behind words by translating them into numerical equations. You can apply this insight to empower your magical effects.
benefit:
Immediately before casting a spell, as a swift action, you can attempt to augment a spellâ€™s casting using Arithmancy. To do so, determine the digital root of the name of the spell you are casting.

To find the digital root of a spell name, first assign a numerical value to each letter of the name, per the Letter Values table. Once you have a string of digits, sum them.
